item.title: China reacts angrily to new Trump tariff, says U.S. addiction is driving fentanyl problem
item.description: China is reacting angrily to President Trump's pledge to impose an additional 10% tariff on its products, saying fentanyl is "the U.S.'s own problem."

item.title: DOGE cuts target weather forecasters in latest firing wave
item.description: Hundreds of weather forecasters and other federal National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration employees on probationary status were fired Thursday...
